title: Why isn't legacy client opening?
body:
So i recently patched up to the new client, i try to click the 'open legacy client' option and once pressed the client goes off but the legacy  client shows up.  The league title doesn't show up in the middle at all and once i press to open league again it doesn't inform me that there's another client open.
How do i fix this??{{item:3070}}  (The new client is too laggy for my laptop to handle)

replies.body:
Hey there,

The legacy client has now been fully deprecated. You can find out more about why from the latest news post:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/new-client-rollout-phase-2

If you're experiencing performance issues with the new client, try running it in "Low spec mode" which can be enabled from the settings menu.
